title: Fresno State professor under fire for Barbara Bush 'racist' tweet
text:
Fresno State professor under fire for Barbara Bush 'racist' tweet   00:54 
California State University at Fresno says it is taking ''seriously'' professor Randa Jarrar's tweet calling Barbara Bush an ''amazing racist'' after the former first lady died on Tuesday, according to the school's Vice President of Academic Affairs Lynnette Zelezny. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
California State University at Fresno says it is taking "seriously" professor Randa Jarrar's tweet calling Barbara Bush an "amazing racist" after the former first lady died on Tuesday, according to the school's Vice President of Academic Affairs Lynnette Zelezny.
